wikipedia_page.main: Sir Harry Mason Garner  (3 November 1891 – 7 August 1977) was a British aerodynamicist who was also notable as an expert on, and collector of, oriental ceramics.

response: The elephants are now in the British Museum, as part of the collection donated by Sir Harry Garner.
* Harry Garner (1891–1977), British expert on oriental ceramics
